definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: The white half moon at the beginning of the nail is an indicator of good thyroid health.
sentences.chinese: 在指甲底端的白色半月形，是一個甲狀腺健康的指標。

sentences.english: Quick-drying nail polishmay save time, but at the expense of your nails.
sentences.chinese: 快乾指甲油更方便，但會損害指甲。

sentences.english: Quick-drying nail polishmay save time, but at the expense of your nails.
sentences.chinese: 快乾指甲油更方便，但會損害指甲。

sentences.english: Men, as a rule of thumb, should always keep their nails clipped.
sentences.chinese: 男人一般來說都應該保持指甲處於修剪過的狀態。

sentences.english: Doesn't paronychia cut fingernail to still have other treatment method?
sentences.chinese: 甲溝炎不切指甲還有別的治療方法嗎？

sentences.english: What vitamin or what is that split to lack on the side of fingernail?
sentences.chinese: 手指甲旁邊那塊裂開了是缺少什麼維生素還是什麼啊？

sentences.english: The pangolin whole body's lamella is its thorn, is similar with the nail.
sentences.chinese: 穿山甲渾身的鱗片就是它的刺，與指甲相類似。

sentences.english: Which nail remover is gentle for my nails?
sentences.chinese: 哪種洗甲水不會損傷指甲？

sentences.english: Upon emerging, he refused to bathe and trimmed his hair and nails only once a year.
sentences.chinese: 他不洗澡，理髮和修指甲則是一年一次。

sentences.english: His longest nail is 35cm (14ins) long and prevents him from making his hand into a fist.
sentences.chinese: 現在他最長的指甲已有35釐米，這使他無法攥拳頭。

sentences.english: When I wake, a tatter of blue and green beneath my nails.
sentences.chinese: 我醒來的時候，我指甲下有一縷藍綠相間的碎布纖維。

sentences.english: Applying Tattoos How to apply henna and tattoos to skin.
sentences.chinese: 應用紋身如何申請指甲花和皮膚紋身。

sentences.english: These spots are usually caused by bumps and scrapes to the base of your nails.
sentences.chinese: 這些白點通常是由於指甲根部受到碰撞和刮擦引起的。

sentences.english: Sometimes stick-on nails are the only way to go.
sentences.chinese: 有時候粘貼上去的假指甲也有同樣的效果喲。

sentences.english: Your hands and nails will stay moisturized for hours.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，你的手和指甲會保溼好幾個小時。

sentences.english: Others change into nonliving parts of the hair and nails.
sentences.chinese: 其它細胞變成毛髮，指甲等無生命部分。
